title: playing without runes
body: how many of u guys r playing without any runes bc your store wont load?

replies.body: unfortunately none of the fixes helped, tech support couldn't help me neither

There are a number of fixes for store issues, most of which can be found in our [Store Issues Guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660)

Let me know if these steps helped.
